description: Takes a unique deletion task identifier as input and returns metadata about a configuration deletion task.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The ID of the task to delete.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current execution status of the deletion task. Valid status are: INITIALIZING | VALIDATING | DELETING | COMPLETED | FAILED.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: An epoch seconds timestamp (UTC) of when the deletion task was started.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: An epoch seconds timestamp (UTC) of when the deletion task was completed or failed.

nested_items.name: configurationType
nested_items.description: The type of configuration item to delete. Supported types are: SERVER.

nested_items.name: requestedConfigurations
nested_items.description: The list of configuration IDs that were originally requested to be deleted by the deletion task.

nested_items.name: deletedConfigurations
nested_items.description: The list of configuration IDs that were successfully deleted by the deletion task.

nested_items.name: failedConfigurations
nested_items.description: A list of configuration IDs that failed to delete during the deletion task, each paired with an error message.

nested_items.name: configurationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the configuration the failed to delete.

nested_items.name: errorStatusCode
nested_items.description: The integer error code associated with the error message.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: A descriptive message indicating why the associated configuration failed to delete.

nested_items.name: deletionWarnings
nested_items.description: A list of configuration IDs that produced warnings regarding their deletion, paired with a warning message.

nested_items.name: configurationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the configuration that produced a warning.

nested_items.name: warningCode
nested_items.description: The integer warning code associated with the warning message.

nested_items.name: warningText
nested_items.description: A descriptive message of the warning the associated configuration ID produced.
